title: @RiotZimberfly Thank you so much!
body:
I really wanted to say thank you to RiotZimberfly for being the rioter to finally address, and even go as far as to FIX Taliyahs missing quotes. 
Soon Tali will be a little less "Throw another rock!" And a little more "Up you go!"
Thanks for replying so nicely and quickly on Twitter.
I look forward to next patch and it's nice to know Riot still cares about our local little stoneweaver :)

replies.body:
Aw, shucks! Thanks gang! Twas my pleasure! I owe the thanks to you tbh, as I was unaware that Taliyah's W efforts were missing, so that visibility helped immensely.

You see, much like finding one gummy worm at the bottom of a box of sour patch kids, every champion in Runeterra is a rare and beautiful snowflake, and we audio folk want to do our part to make sure they are sounding their absolute best. If you happen to notice anything else amiss in game that you feel might be a little off, please don't hesistate to hit me up directly on the ol' Twitter and I gotchu, fam!

Seriously though this is a super nice message. You're the real MVP <3

I don't remember which patch made them disappear, but LeBlanc used to have quotes when her clone disappeared (it was "Classic misdirection", iirc). 
Were those quotes intentionally removed or is this a case of "missing quotes"? 

You could be the right guy to give LB that one buff she really needs.

> [{quoted}](name=zImaginaerum,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=c2YbZpEE,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2017-06-17T01:16:27.684+0000)
>
> I don't remember which patch made them disappear, but LeBlanc used to have quotes when her clone disappeared (it was "Classic misdirection", iirc). 
> Were those quotes intentionally removed or is this a case of "missing quotes"? 
> 
> You could be the right guy to give LB that one buff she really needs.

Wow. *slow clap* Well spotted, my friend! You are absolutely correct. I had no idea, and we didn't have that issue bugged, but I found a broken hook for those exact lines. Fear not, bud, they are 100% fixed and back in action. Once 7.13 goes live, LB will once again be BMing with the best of us. Good ears! LB mains across the globe will sing thy praises. <3

Omg now I can finally double-gank botlane with my clone and tilt the enemy botlane through BMing quotes and mastery emote. 

That's beautiful. ;_; Thank you!

Hey Zimber! Not too long ago, Riot Ranger helped me restore some old sound effects of Quinn's that had been lost after her champion update. One of them still remains lost though, and that is Phoenix Quinn's unique Skystrike sound effect, which also mysteriously disappeared with the rework. Is there any way we could get that sound back? 

For reference, here is a video that compares what the current Phoenix Quinn's Skystrike sounds like (it is using the default sound ATM), with the original sound that was unique to the skin only. Skip to 0:07 in the video: 

https://youtu.be/MiwKq0gRLp4

If there's any way you could help with this that'd be awesome! Thanks :D

Hey Valor! You are absolutely correct, my friend. Fantastic ears! Phoenix Quinn was in fact using the incorrect sound for Skystrike. I went ahead and fixed that right up for ya, so that fix will go out with 7.13! Bonus points for such a clear and detailed video. Thanks for making Quinn players around the globe happy!
Before her rework, she stopped say anything at all when she attacked enemies at some point. I brought it up to Riot, but no one gave S&*@.
Oh thank goodness! If I heard that line one more time in ARAM I was totally gonna dodge the queue whenever no one rerolls her in my team.  Bravo RiotZimberfly!

@RiotZimberfly did a half assed job he forgot to add to add one quote.
"we need to build a wall"
